home.title: Welcome to the Home Page
home.description: This is the home page of the application. Here you will find the latest news and updates.

about.title: About This Application
about.description: This application is designed to provide users with a seamless experience. It includes features such as user authentication, data management, and real-time updates. The goal is to create a user-friendly interface that allows for easy navigation and interaction with the application's functionalities.
